item.title: The US Invaded Venezuela and Captured Nicolás Maduro. ChatGPT Disagrees
item.description: Some AI chatbots have a surprisingly good handle on breaking news. Others decidedly don’t.

item.title: Stop Using Your Keyboard and Start Using Handy, a Free Speech-to-Text App
item.description: It’s called Handy, and it uses AI models to accurately convert your speaking voice into text—all for free.

item.title: Blood Feud: Oura’s Health Panels Versus Whoop’s Advanced Labs
item.description: It’s easier than ever to order your own blood draws, but direct-access testing won’t replace a doctor.
